segments.text: Hi , Alan . I feel very nervous because I am going to have a job interview next Monday . Could you please give me some suggestions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Firstly , it is very important for you to be punctual . Interviewers usually don ’ t think much of a candidate who comes 5 or 10 minutes late only to explain that he could not find the place or he was stuck in traffic .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Secondly , you need to create a good image in a limited time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will try my best to make a good impression , but it is always easier said that done .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you should make some preparations . For example , you should take care to appear well-groomed and modestly dressed . What ’ s more , try to avoid a too causal style .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I wear T-shirt and jeans for the job interview ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ d better not . Informal clothes like sports shirts , tom jeans or dirty sneakers convey the impression that you are not serious about the job , or that you may be casual about your work as you are about your clothes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've got it . I think I will wear a white shirt with a tie . Thank you for your suggestions .
segments.speaker: S1
